name: Mat the Fat - Stay Fit with any 2 exercises
name_original: Mat the Fat - Stay Fit with any 2 exercises
description:
Time to Mat That Fat

HUMTY : The problem is : Obesity RUNS in my Family
Dumty : No the Problem is : NOBODY RUNS IN YOUR FAMILY

Time to put on your running shoes and start running.
Lose Weight by running in this hilarious game of fitness
NOW 4 WAYS TO LOSE WEIGHT :
1.TREADMILL
2.PUSH UPS
3.BENCH PRESS
4.DUMB BELLS
